issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

1.4.1.ec5d6d 4.1 and 3.1.2

1.Phone>Camera Basic>take an image, tap "use" and check the output

results: Mon Sep 13 10:21:51 unknown sandboxd[628] : KitchenSink(623) deny file-write-data /private/var/mobile/Media/PhotoData

think this is a regression, but not 100%

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: unexpected output ("unknown sandbox") on Phone>Camera Basic

comments.body:
Tested with:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208201549
Titanium SDK: 2.2.0.v20120828110118 / 2.2.0.v20120827143312 / 2.2.0.v20120823165712

iPhone 4.3.5

An unexpected output still occurs.

Here is the log:
Aug 28 13:28:08 unknown sandboxd[605] <Notice>: KitchenSink(600) deny file-write-data /private/var/mobile/Media/PhotoData
Aug 28 13:28:08 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.kitchensink[0xa704][600] <Notice>: [DEBUG] Our type was: public.image
Closing ticket as we no longer support this version of Kitchen Sink.
